txt.en: 'Deeds! Get your Thaurisgar, the Vile Apothecary Deeds here!\n\n'Talk to me one more time, and they're all yours!'
Thaurisgar, the Vile Apothecary Tier 2 through 4 Completion!
Speak to Chiver Me Timbers to continue
By completing this quest, you will automatically complete the Thaurisgar, the Vile Apothecary, tiers 2 through 4 instance deeds or quests.
